name: Money Minefield
overview: With a shout-out to the Toronto PET User Group on the title screen, one of the longest continually operating Commodore centered user groups in the world it is hard to not consider this Collect-em-up style game as being associated with them. The fact that this is presented in all PETSCII means that this might have been ported to or from other Commodore systems. Maneuver your car through a deadly minefield, avoiding all the obstacles and collect money bags. Good luck!
